alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 17 at 7:40PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Rooks, southwestern Osborne and south central Phillips Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 740 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Woodston to near Damar. Movement was south at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Plainville, Stockton, Natoma, Palco, Damar, Zurich, Codell and Webster State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Kansas.
